<<<<<<< HEAD
A short view of the chief points in controversy between the reformed churches and the Church of Rome in two letters to the Duke of Bouillon, upon his turning papist / written by the Reverend Peter Du Moulin ... Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658. Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.
[6], 88 p.
Printed for Benjamin Tooke ..., London : 1680.
"Newly translated out of French copy which was never printed." Letters written by Pierre Du Moulin fifty years earlier. Cf. pref. Edited by Peter Du Moulin the Younger. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
A short view of the chief points in controversy between the reformed churches and the Church of Rome in two letters to the Duke of Bouillon, upon his turning papist / written by the Reverend Peter Du Moulin ... Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658. Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.
[6], 88 p.
Printed for Benjamin Tooke ..., London : 1680.
"Newly translated out of French copy which was never printed." Letters written by Pierre Du Moulin fifty years earlier. Cf. pref. Edited by Peter Du Moulin the Younger. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Benjamin Tooke
